sentences.sentence: Women can post their pictures on the contest's website - but only after submitting a police mugshot to prove their background.
sentences.translation: 有意参赛的女孩可以在选美会网站上刊登自己的照片，但前提是必须先提交自己被警方拍的犯人照，以证明有案底。

sentences.sentence: Unlike previous ones, the e-passports contain biometric data embedded in a radio-frequency identification (RFID) chip, along with the usual mugshot and optical bar-code.
sentences.translation: 跟上一代不同，电子护照除了包含照片及光感条码之外，还记有生物体征数据，植在无线电频率识别(RFID)芯片上。
